list_definition.definition: (short for zoological garden) a place where wild animals are kept for the public to see, and for study, breeding etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I thought I’d take the children to the zoo on Sunday.

list_ex_of_english: Over 8,000 words are entertainingly and informatively covered, from a to zoo.
If the camel was seen at the zoo, then 1904 was the year.
A very dangerous wild cat escaped from the zoo.
Furthermore, he had visited a petting zoo 1 week before the onset of symptoms.
The results substantiate that there is an infection risk for zoo animals.
Specific antibodies were detected in 154 (10.4 %) out of 1487 zoo animals tested.
The association with visits to farms, small-holdings or zoos, was no longer significant.
Seroprevalences varying among zoos are believed to be based on unequal expositions caused mainly by differences in the occurrence and infection rates of vector-competent ticks.
